thread.title: Monica Oden
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Monica Oden

author: Monica Oden
title: Monica Oden
text:
Initially, there was a miscommunication...
A representative (Ms. Jennifer) from Framesdirect called me and made the experience all worth while. I want you to know I received my frames and are enjoying them, so much that I ordered another pair. Thank you for reaching out to me and for caring about your customers.
